name: mova-lsp-monorepo
description: MOVA Language Server Protocol (LSP) monorepo with npm-first, ESM architecture

scripts.build: npm -w packages/schemas run build && npm -w packages/sdk run build && npm -w packages/server-lsp run build && npm -w packages/client-vscode run build && npm -w packages/cli run build
scripts.test: npm -w packages/schemas run test && npm -w packages/sdk run test && npm -w packages/server-lsp run test && npm -w packages/client-vscode run test && npm -w packages/cli run test
scripts.lint: npm -w packages/schemas run lint && npm -w packages/sdk run lint && npm -w packages/server-lsp run lint && npm -w packages/client-vscode run lint && npm -w packages/cli run lint
scripts.format: npm -w packages/schemas run format && npm -w packages/sdk run format && npm -w packages/server-lsp run format && npm -w packages/client-vscode run format && npm -w packages/cli run format
scripts.dev: npm -w packages/sdk run dev & npm -w packages/server-lsp run dev
scripts.publish:all: npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint && changeset publish
